description:
**Vaporise Yanfei**
To deliver devastating Charged Attacks, Vaporize Yanfei relies on stacking Scarlet Seals and Xingqiu's off-field Hydro application.

**Overload Yanfei**
Overload Yanfei uses Fischl's A4 Talent to keep an Electro aura on foes, allowing her to repeatedly activate Overload. Yanfei may run as a very inexpensive and comfy driver of the immensely strong Beidou unit with this playstyle.

**Other playstyles**
Other Yanfei variants include Reverse Melt Yanfei, in which Yanfei provides Pyro application for Rosaria and Kaeya to Melt their Bursts off of, and Mono-Pyro Yanfei, in which Yanfei is on-field while Xiangling and other Pyro, Anemo, and Geo units inflict damage off-field, among others.

To view a more in-depth guide on this character, check out the KQM guide linked below!
title: Yanfei | Playstyle
